description: TestDrive environment for Java Application and MySQL Database
creator: 6157cefa-47df-4c5d-97b1-f940d678da21

recipe.content:
kind: List
items:
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   name: testdrive
   labels:
    type: db
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     image: 'docker.io/maltron/wildfly-che:latest'
     name: frontend
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 8080
       protocol: TCP
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 2048Mi
    - 
     image: centos/mysql-57-centos7
     name: database
     ports:
      - 
       name: mysql
       containerPort: 3306
       protocol: TCP
     env:
      - 
       name: MYSQL_USER
       value: testdrive
      - 
       name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
       value: testdrive
      - 
       name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
       value: testdrive
      - 
       name: MYSQL_DATABASE
       value: testdrive
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 512Mi
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Service
  metadata:
   name: database
  spec:
   selector:
    type: db
   ports:
    - 
     name: mysql
     port: 3306
     protocol: TCP
     targetPort: mysql

name: TestDrive CI with Database
